people_also_ask.heading: There are three kinds of fabric used for shoes material. First, the mesh fabric which is made of nylon or polyester yarn is very breathable. Besides the normal color, some of them can also be metallic silver color. ... It looks like carbon, but it is made of nylon or polyester yarn. So, it is called similar carbon fabric.

people_also_ask.heading: Since running is a more intense sport, runners tend to exert more energy. Your feet get hot, and most running shoes are made of mesh to allow air to move freely. This mesh also keeps the shoe lighter.

people_also_ask.heading: Mix a small amount of laundry detergent and oxygen bleach with warm water in a bucket or sink. Submerge the shoes in the water, swishing them around. Let the shoes soak for five minutes. Use a soft brush to gently scrub at the dirt that has loosened during the soaking.15-Nov-2018
